## dialog.setPrompt() function

Sets the function to be run when Blockly.dialog.prompt() is called.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function setPrompt(promptFunction: (p1: string, p2: string, p3: (p1: string | null) => void) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  promptFunction | (p1: string, p2: string, p3: (p1: string \| null) =&gt; void) =&gt; void | The function to be run. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
